statements: SELECT id, report_date, total_revenue, total_expenses, net_income FROM financial_report;
SELECT net_income, total_revenue, total_expenses, report_date, id FROM financial_report;
SELECT total_revenue, net_income, report_date FROM financial_report;
SELECT * FROM financial_report ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT id, total_revenue FROM financial_report WHERE total_revenue > 1000;
SELECT id, report_date, total_revenue, total_expenses, net_income FROM financial_report WHERE report_date = '2021-08-31'
SELECT * FROM financial_report WHERE total_revenue > 10000 AND total_expenses < 5000
SELECT id, report_date FROM financial_report WHERE net_income > 0 ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT id, total_revenue FROM financial_report WHERE total_revenue = (SELECT MAX(total_revenue) FROM financial_report)
SELECT id, total_revenue, total_expenses FROM financial_report WHERE total_revenue > total_expenses ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM FinancialTransactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM FinancialTransactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT description FROM FinancialTransactions WHERE amount > 1000.00 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM Accounts WHERE balance BETWEEN -500.00 AND 500.00 ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM FinancialTransactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM FinancialTransactions WHERE description LIKE '%salary%' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM FinancialTransactions;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM Accounts WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, description FROM FinancialTransactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT description, amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE type = 'Savings';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT transaction_date, SUM(amount) FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY transaction_date
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT account_name, type, balance FROM accounts WHERE type = 'Savings'
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, category FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts INNER JOIN balance_sheet ON accounts.account_id = balance_sheet.account_id;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, category FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date = '2020-01-01';
SELECT account_name, account_type FROM accounts ORDER BY account_type DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT balance_id, balance FROM balance_sheet WHERE balance_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, category FROM transactions WHERE account_id = 100;
SELECT account_name, opening_balance, currency_code FROM accounts ORDER BY opening_balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT category_id, category_name, parent_category_id FROM categories WHERE category_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_name, opening_balance FROM accounts WHERE currency_code = 'USD';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM categories WHERE parent_category_id IS NULL;
SELECT account_id, balance, last_updated FROM balances WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
